: : Kup : :

Kup followed Quet on the tour. He felt a wave of mixed feelings. At one second he was smileing as he saw his Autobot comrades, the next he frowned at the sight of a Decepticon.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Quet:

Quet was walking around some sleep bots "In your left side, the 
villians of villians: MEgatron!!!! in your right, one of the 
greatest Autobots' spy... Bunblebee; in Front of you... One of the 
most brilliant autobots mind:Wheeljack "

Quet continue naming famous autobots and decepticons

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Yggdrasil followed Quet into the bowels of the Ark. He felt a 
certain
> tension mounting as the realization of seeing his revered ancestor
> dawned on him. He remained especially quiet, lost in his 
thoughts...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Quet::
> > 
> > "Ok, I'm ready to be the touris-guide"said the male he walked 
> > towards the Ark door "Follow me, It's time to see the Ark "

as
